name: Corporate Fulfillment 2058
description:
Welcome, contractor!

We've got a lot of work available, so I hope you'll step up and help. Combine components through a simple set of controls. Create products to fulfill our requests. Earn reputation as you level up within our organization. Help us shape the world to our desire.

What could be more fulfilling? Join us today, for free!

----

Enjoy a unique take on puzzles and combine hundreds of components to create products for your corporate overlords!

Explore over 100 unique product recipes!

Experience a tale of corporate greed from the front lines!

Play for free, with no ads!
